summary: The diff implements most of the required visibility enforcement features. Frontend changes (PostCard, MyPostsPage) clearly address REQ-4. Backend changes in main.mo appear to include visibility types and post structures. However, the backend diff is heavily truncated, making it difficult to confirm full implementation of REQ-1 (private post filtering in feed queries, per-ID access control) and REQ-2 (chronological ordering, no reshare methods). The CommunityFeedPage file summary mentions auth guard changes but does not explicitly confirm removal of share/reshare UI elements (REQ-3), and the PublicPostCard component is not shown in the diff at all.

missing_requirements.requirement: A non-author caller cannot retrieve a specific private post by ID.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend diff is truncated and does not show a per-ID access control check that blocks non-authors from fetching private posts by ID. The filtering logic is not visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: No share, copy link, or reshare button is visible on any post card in the community feed. PublicPostCard and other feed-related components must have these controls removed.
missing_requirements.reason: The CommunityFeedPage file summary only mentions auth guard changes. There is no mention of PublicPostCard modifications or removal of share/reshare/copy-link UI elements. The PublicPostCard component does not appear in the diff at all.

missing_requirements.requirement: The community feed displays posts in chronological order in the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The CommunityFeedPage summary only mentions auth guard refactoring. No chronological sorting logic is described for the frontend feed page.
